# ByteConverter.FromInt16 method

Writes a signed 8-bit value to a buffer.

```csharp
public void FromInt16(short value, Span<byte> buffer)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | The signed 8-bit value to write to the buffer. |
| buffer | The buffer to write the value to. |
